MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Pen y LLys, Dyserth Road, Bryn LLys and the surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.37PM on 6th February 2021.
